mapper.sql: return_orders_id, orders_id, goods_id, user_id, return_flow_number, express_name, express_number, return_goods_price, express_price, return_orders_price, return_type, goods_type, status, return_remark, check_fail_remark, create_time, check_time, check_fail_time, return_success_time
mapper.select: SELECT r.return_flow_number returnFlowNumber, r.express_name expressName, r.express_number expressNumber, r.return_goods_price returnGoodsPrice, r.express_price expressPrice, r.return_orders_price returnOrdersPrice, r.return_type returnType, r.goods_type goodsType, r.status status, r.return_remark returnRemark, r.check_fail_remark checkFailRemark, r.create_time createTime, r.check_time checkTime, r.check_fail_time checkFailTime, r.return_success_time returnSuccessTime, ri.url url, g.goods_name goodsName, u.user_nick_name userNickName, oc.consignee_name consigneeName, oc.consignee_phone consigneePhone, oc.province province, oc.city city, oc.area area, oc.address address, o.flow_number flowNumber, au.admin_user_name checkUserName FROM t_shop_return_orders r INNER JOIN t_shop_goods g ON r.goods_id = g.goods_id INNER JOIN t_web_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN t_shop_orders o ON r.orders_id = o.orders_id INNER JOIN t_shop_orders_consignee oc ON r.orders_id = oc.orders_id LEFT JOIN t_shop_return_orders_images ri ON r.return_orders_id = ri.return_orders_id LEFT JOIN t_admin_user au ON r.check_user_id = au.admin_user_id WHERE r.return_orders_id = #{returnOrdersId}
